Module_Description: The color_sensor module enables you to write code that reacts to specific colors or the intensity of the reflected light.
SubModule_Description: The color_sensor module enables you to write code that reacts to specific colors or the intensity of the reflected light.

Function.Function_Description: Returns the color value of the detected color. Use the color module to map the color value to a specific color.

Function_Arguments.Argument_Description: A port from the port submodule in the hub module

Function_Snippet.Python_Code:
import color_sensor
from hub import port
import color

if color_sensor.color(port.A) is color.RED:
    print("Red detected")
